author: SmithPlatts
body:
# Steps to reproduce

Create a script with the following:

```powershell
[CmdletBinding(SupportsShouldProcess = $true)]
Param (
    [string]$Arg1,
    [int]$Arg2
)

Write-Host "Line: $($MyInvocation.Line)"
```

And call it with `script.ps1 -Arg1 "Hello world" -Arg2 1 -WhatIf:$true`

# Expected behavior

```none
> & /path/to/script.ps1 -Arg1 "Hello world" -Arg2 1 -WhatIf:$true
Line: /path/to/script.ps1 -Arg1 "Hello world" -Arg2 1 -WhatIf:$true
```

# Actual behavior

```none
> /path/to/script.ps1 -Arg1 "Hello world" -Arg2 1 -WhatIf:$true
Line: 
```

# Environment data

```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.2.3
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.2.3
OS                             Linux 4.15.0-70-generic #79-Ubuntu SMP Tue Nov 12 10:36:11 UTC 2019
Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
